tool_description: Configures application tracking and management settings for a job posting including screening questions, workflow stages, and automated responses.

posting_id.description: Unique identifier of the job posting to configure tracking for

screening_questions.description: List of screening questions to ask applicants

workflow_stages.description: Custom workflow stages for application processing

auto_response_enabled.description: Whether to send automatic confirmation emails to applicants

error_messages: Invalid posting ID: The provided posting ID does not exist or is not accessible
Too many screening questions: Maximum 10 screening questions allowed
Invalid workflow stage: Workflow stages must be non-empty strings
Configuration conflict: Some settings are incompatible with the job posting platform requirements
usage: Provide the posting ID from a distributed job posting. Optionally configure screening questions, custom workflow stages, and automatic response settings. The tool sets up tracking and management for incoming applications.

tracker_id.description: Unique identifier for the application tracking configuration

tracking_url.description: URL to access the application tracking dashboard

configured_stages.description: Final list of workflow stages configured for this posting

automation_status.description: Status of automated features: enabled, partial, or disabled
